code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:white M aged 34 yrs presents with mild difficulty with reading and writing, mild difficulty seeing similarities and differences in letters and words. patient also reports of mild difficulty in school. he denies ever using cigarettes denies any alcohol use o:Height 187 cm, Weight 92.2 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 16 a:Dyslexia p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed METHYLIN - 2.5 mg 2 x daily (max. 54 mg/day), and ordered Hearing Test.

content2.Unmatched: he denies ever using cigarettes denies any alcohol use

td.content: s:patient describes recurrent mild difficulty with reading and writing over the past month. The pt reports mild difficulty in school, mild difficulty seeing similarities and differences in letters and words. pt is a 35 year old m dispatcher. o:Height 188 cm, Weight 94.5 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 17 a:Dyslexia p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed METHYLIN - 2.5 mg 2 x daily (max. 54 mg/day), and ordered Hearing Test.
